Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: GAME OVER
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Meet a designer, a gold farmer, specialists and players who will immerse you into a virtual world that has not only influenced mass entertainment, but has become a technological, social, cultural and economic phenomenon.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: It's the second largest, and grooviest looking planet. It's also a mini-solar system with 60 moons (most of them recently discovered) and those crazy rings. It's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighbourhood.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: With the Dawn mission's exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. We'll see what's new in big floating space rocks.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Heading Southwest from the Fraser Canyon - BC's lower Mainland is a mix of remote mountain ranges, spectacular cityscapes and diverse Marine life - as the Fraser River meets the open waters of the Pacific.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From St. John's heading north, the Newfoundland coastline is a maze of iconic bays and inlets - from world-famous Fogo Island, to the abandoned fishing settlements along the island's Northern peninsula.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: ELEPHANTS IN THE ROOM
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The largest creature that walks this planet is shrouded in mystery. It is the elephant; majestic, intelligent, dangerous. They can be man's best friend ... or his worst enemy. This is the story of an elephant called Wonky Tusk. She is the matriarch to her five family members. One of her impressive tusks point backwards and this makes her instantly recognisable. But she is famous for quite another reason...

Clip.Title: BORN FIGHTING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Senator James Webb traces the early battles and evolving personality quirks of a group in Scotland that, centuries later, would help forge the American spirit.

Clip.Title: BORN FIGHTING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Senator James Webb goes on a personal journey to trace the story of the Scots-Irish, from their exodus to the New World in the 1700s to their massive cultural and political influence on America today.

Clip.Title: FIGHTING IRISH OF THE CIVIL WAR
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Irish Brigade, or Fighting Irish were new arrivals to America, proud soldiers who fought on side with Americans in the Civil War, paving the way for all immigrant groups that followed.

Clip.Title: FIGHTING IRISH OF THE CIVIL WAR
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Irish Brigade along with with their exiled leader fought for the Union in the Civil War with much courage, battle after battle.

Clip.Title: BORN FIGHTING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Senator James Webb traces the early battles and evolving personality quirks of a group in Scotland that, centuries later, would help forge the American spirit.
